txt.en: Duilin can be found in Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should speak with Duilin.
Maeganc can be found somewhere in Southern Ithilien.\n\nYou should defeat Maeganc.
'Ah you have returned and brought the bear to us. I am sure it was no trouble at all for you. Now if you will excuse us we must prepare ourselves for a real hunt with a Mûmak!'
The bounty notice reads:\n\n'I seek a certain bear as a trophy. Come speak with me for further details. Duilin'
A bounty notice asks you to seek out Duilin who has information about Maeganc, a ravenous wild beast in Southern Ithilien.

You ask Duilin about the bounty notice.\n\n'Ah yes the great bear, Maeganc. My brother and I have been very busy. So busy in fact that we've not the time to hunt this exquisite game. The Mûmak calls us as the ultimate hunt. If you hunt this bear for us, I promise you will be handsomely rewarded. The bear's head would look grand in our hall back in the Blackroot Vale!'
Duilin can be found in Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should speak with Duilin.
